attributes.action: investigate voting technology like the TV programme "Who wants to be a millionaire" to cut down the rowdiness of the House of Commons and consider timed interspersions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In our house,w e use an egg timer - do the MP's wish to borrow it ?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
